channel.title: 8085 on Sinu John
channel.description: Recent content in 8085 on Sinu John

item.title: j8085sim
item.description: I just published my BTech miniproject - 8085sim, an 8085 simulator - on Sourceforge. Download it from here -http://sourceforge.net/projects/j8085sim/ To get a valid name I added a ‘j’ (short for Java) before the name, so it is now ‘j8085sim’. This project is the result of about 5 weeks work by me and my team mates - Jinsmon Kurian and Deepu Devassy. Since the project demo is over, I believe this software should now be released.
